targets.query: SELECT itinerary_id, journey_state, risk_reason, latest_event_time FROM baggage.itinerary_status WHERE journey_state IN ('AT_RISK_FOR_CONNECTION','DELAYED_OR_REROUTED','EXCEPTION') ORDER BY latest_event_time DESC LIMIT 100
targets.rawSql: SELECT itinerary_id, journey_state, risk_reason, latest_event_time FROM baggage.itinerary_status WHERE journey_state IN ('AT_RISK_FOR_CONNECTION','DELAYED_OR_REROUTED','EXCEPTION') ORDER BY latest_event_time DESC LIMIT 100

targets.query: SELECT formatDateTime(created_at,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S') AS time, severity, payload FROM baggage.alerts ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 200
targets.rawSql: SELECT formatDateTime(created_at,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S') AS time, severity, payload FROM baggage.alerts ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 200
